title: When's the Best Time to Buy a Plane Ticket?
text: BING NEWS: Hot tips for buying holiday airfares And the question on everyone’s lips is “When’s the best time to buy?” Airfarewatchdog.com has been in the ... The financial sector has long used algorithms to predict market fluctuations, but they're also being ... 05/22/2014 - 7:26 am | View Link When to Buy Your Plane Ticket, Based on Data from Four Million Trips When's the best time to buy? CheapAir crunched the numbers from over four million tickets bought last year to offer some advice. Those four million tickets add up to a database of 1.3 billion air fares.
